channel.title: Project Rogue - [317-369] Era Emulation
channel.description:
Hello there, and welcome to the Project-Rogue development thread!
This thread will be updated as I continue to update my current project. Currently the project is for fun with a few friends but if enough changes are made I may end up hosting this.
Goal: To run a fun, unique, and functional 317/369 era server that mixes a lot of the good ideas commonly seen on OLD RuneScape private servers.
Update Log: This will be updated when larger updates are made to the source. Smaller updates/tweaks mostly are posted in the 'Media' section.
[spoiler=] Media: [img]https://gyazo.com/b3474b0c9de89cedc66bde05f078eac6.png[/img]
This is where new-players log in, and also where you end up when you choose the 'western' end of the Yanille teleport.
[img]https://gyazo.com/b0b86176259bb23ee8070692dc871781.png[/img]
[img]https://gyazo.com/85391f4734e98f4588ad624bf5f10fcd.gif[/img]
Pick-pocketing has been added in-game.
[img]https://gyazo.com/bfbc7cf28ee84bf76a1e6b4f2b4ef81b.png[/img]
Slayer has been added in-game.
[img]https://gyazo.com/0b91c27057044bdd1d2b8c7bddac9325.png[/img]
New bank interface, added in deposit inventory and equipment.
[img]https://gyazo.com/0d68b3d9a04c9247e1944be5a4ef7add.png[/img]
[img]https://gyazo.com/3ec69a306ecc7957cf53d76bc5aee9b1.png[/img]
Easy, Medium, and Hard clue have been added in-game.
[img]https://gyazo.com/5a129bfd58c2915dae58329762bd3a7f.gif[/img]
A new Mystery Roll box has been added, this simply contains some good skilling/alchables and other items for common use.
[img]https://gyazo.com/23a3c11481dc3645e73e80d72436a7c5.gif[/img]
Crystal key chest has been added with loots similar to RS with some new ones added in.
[img]https://gyazo.com/8482e498815dfcaeb3ac9c6c993f927a.gif[/img]
Added in bone offerings, although this era doesn't include the right GFX, I thought the new one would do.
[img]https://gyazo.com/e17cc468c5001b8dc02592f34fae2ce0.png[/img] [img]https://gyazo.com/e674d1e981310e14b2644ff28d14f724.gif[/img]
At the bottom of the Mages' Guild you can fight the 3 different 'God' Mages. This cost a one-time fee and allows you access to their cape/staff and other magic-based drops.
[img]https://gyazo.com/f64b685d62e83ca772a55f934ceb0401.gif[/img]
You can now speak to the Dark Mage below the Mages' Guild and obtain up to 120 runes for 1,000 gold. (20 of each rune type maximum).
[img]https://gyazo.com/398a5fd4907692c8691ee9546b81ffaf.png[/img]
[img]https://gyazo.com/8359e3a49111bfb3ef26bc3127c6b381.png[/img]
[img]https://gyazo.com/8712dec7b1524edaad2c9aa6a8bbbd55.png[/img]
[img]https://gyazo.com/c6ff39742f0efc517d35cb60ef8e8a55.png[/img]
Current layout of the Yanille dungeon.
[img]https://gyazo.com/c2d0e538a1e2cc76cf098ce9c735aa23.png[/img]
Lumberjack Leif will loot all logs when talked to. Dondakan the Dwarf will note all ores when talked to. Fisherman Frodi will note all fish when talked to. [/spoiler]
This is currently the second day of development so please allow media and posts to build over the course of this server's production.
Thanks. :)

item.title: Project Rogue - [317-369] Era Emulation
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

Looks cool, good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Rogue - [317-369] Era Emulation
item.dc:creator: @Rogue_Project Rogue Project
item.description:
@Rogue_Project wrote:

Skype™:

I like the looks of this but when it’s finished what are you looking for?

A medium-xp rate, economy-based 317-369 era server.

Update:

Three new NPCs have been spawned around home Skilling areas, these new NPCs will note their respective skill’s loot.

Example:
Lumberjack Leif will loot all logs when talked to.
Dondakan the Dwarf will note all ores when talked to.
Fisherman Frodi will note all fish when talked to.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Rogue - [317-369] Era Emulation
item.dc:creator: @Rogue_Project Rogue Project
item.description:
@Rogue_Project wrote:

runescape sucks:

That’s a default thing in most browsers afaik. If you hit backspace, it should send you back a page.

But most sites only do that if I’m not in a box where I can type or something along those lines, I keep typing mistakes and go to hit back to delete it and it goes back pages.

Update:

f64b685d62e83ca772a55f934ceb0401.gif756×500

You can now speak to the Dark Mage below the Mages’ Guild and obtain up to 120 runes for 1,000 gold. (20 of each rune type maximum).

85391f4734e98f4588ad624bf5f10fcd.gif764×494

Master Farmers can now be pick-pocketed.

Read full topic

Added in bone offerings, although this era doesn’t include the right GFX, I thought the new one would do.


[/quote]
Looking nice![/quote]

Thanks.

Just Creative:

I didn’t the request. What is your skype name? I’ll add you.

PM’d

Btw, anyone know why every-time I back-space it goes back a page, only on Mopar for some reason?

Read full topic

item.title: Project Rogue - [317-369] Era Emulation
item.dc:creator: @Rogue_Project Rogue Project
item.description:
@Rogue_Project wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:553698”]

bfbc7cf28ee84bf76a1e6b4f2b4ef81b.png761×499

This was always a pet peeve of mine. Underscores just look completely ugly to me. Fixing it makes it look sexy.[/quote]

public static String formatPlayerName(String str) {
		str = ucFirst(str);
		str.replace("_", " ");
		return str;
	}

That should take care of that eh?

As for updates the Fishing skill has been added, you can now access the following fish:

Shrimp
Sardine
Trout
Tuna
Lobster
Swordfish
Sea Turtle
Shark

2aac60ba24a9dbb5879fc99c0acbd68e.png763×497

Read full topic

item.title: Project Rogue - [317-369] Era Emulation
item.dc:creator: @Rogue_Project Rogue Project
item.description:
@Rogue_Project wrote:

Hello there, and welcome to the Project-Rogue development thread!

This thread will be updated as I continue to update my current project. Currently the project is for fun with a few friends but if enough changes are made I may end up hosting this.

Goal: To run a fun, unique, and functional 317/369 era server that mixes a lot of the good ideas commonly seen on OLD RuneScape private servers.

Update Log:
This will be updated when larger updates are made to the source. Smaller updates/tweaks mostly are posted in the ‘Media’ section.

[spoiler=]
Media:

b3474b0c9de89cedc66bde05f078eac6.png762×499

This is where new-players log in, and also where you end up when you choose the ‘western’ end of the Yanille teleport.

85391f4734e98f4588ad624bf5f10fcd.gif764×494

Pick-pocketing has been added in-game.

bfbc7cf28ee84bf76a1e6b4f2b4ef81b.png761×499

Slayer has been added in-game.

New bank interface, added in deposit inventory and equipment.

Easy, Medium, and Hard clue have been added in-game.

A new Mystery Roll box has been added, this simply contains some good skilling/alchables and other items for common use.

Crystal key chest has been added with loots similar to RS with some new ones added in.

Added in bone offerings, although this era doesn’t include the right GFX, I thought the new one would do.


At the bottom of the Mages’ Guild you can fight the 3 different ‘God’ Mages.
This cost a one-time fee and allows you access to their cape/staff and other magic-based drops.

f64b685d62e83ca772a55f934ceb0401.gif756×500

You can now speak to the Dark Mage below the Mages’ Guild and obtain up to 120 runes for 1,000 gold. (20 of each rune type maximum).

Current layout of the Yanille dungeon.

Lumberjack Leif will loot all logs when talked to.
Dondakan the Dwarf will note all ores when talked to.
Fisherman Frodi will note all fish when talked to.
[/spoiler]

This is currently the second day of development so please allow media and posts to build over the course of this server’s production.

Thanks.

Read full topic
